# status-card

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                 | Type                                          | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | --------------------------- | --------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `customClass` | `custom-class` | Custom CSS classes          | `string`                                      | `undefined` |
| `dismissible` | `dismissible`  | Whether card is dismissible | `boolean`                                     | `false`     |
| `message`     | `message`      | Card message                | `string`                                      | `undefined` |
| `showIcon`    | `show-icon`    | Whether to show icon        | `boolean`                                     | `true`      |
| `status`      | `status`       | Card status                 | `"error" \| "info" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'info'`    |
| `title`       | `title`        | Card title                  | `string`                                      | `undefined` |
